channel.title: Classpath and path
channel.description: im not sure how to resolve this probelm i have just brought up on myself... as some of you should know you need to change the CLASSPATH and path on java to get your computer to recognize java i changed them and now no private server works for me... does anyone know what they are before changed please help

item.description:

lolol ahha ooops cleva me ;D [br][size=1]Posted at: July 08, 2006, 09:51:36 AM[/size][hr]hold on that dont even work lol but i think i shall re format my comp anyways it needs it

item.title: Classpath and path
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

are you sure you added ;x:\progra~1\java\jdk1.5.0_0y\bin, where x is your drive letter and y your version? i don’t hope you copy-pasted ;d:\progra~1\java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin lol

Read full topic

item.title: Classpath and path
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

i just had to add ;d:\progra~1\java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin in PATH. Classpath doesn’t even excist.
Note: i have 2k, and i’m not sure if there are big differences with xp. i believe this is the same

Read full topic

item.title: Classpath and path
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Classpath:
SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%
%SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin

Read full topic

item.title: Classpath and path
item.dc:creator: @m3l33_man m3l33 man
item.description:
@m3l33_man wrote:

alrite thank you ill try that and get back to you[br][size=1]Posted at: July 06, 2006, 11:42:06 AM[/size][hr]nope that didnt work still the same the message i get when trying to open a client is:

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
press any key to continue . . .

so i need the original path and class path but i cant get it back… does anyone know what it is[br][size=1]Posted at: July 06, 2006, 11:52:31 AM[/size][hr]ok i dont even have a classpath or path anymore its gone from the system >enviromental variables list

let me check something… everyone that knows how to get to classpath and path please could you post what yours is so i can see the differences and find out what mine is beacuse no client works anymore :mad:

Read full topic
